segments.text: Do you have any certificate that has something to do with tourism ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I have the Tour Guide Certificate .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Why do you choose our travel agency ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Because your travel agency has a good fame in this market ; what's more , all the staff here are working very hard . I like doing some challenging job .
segments.speaker: S2
